definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: In heraldry, orange is symbolic of strength and endurance.
sentences.chinese: 在纹章学中，橙色代表力量和耐性。

sentences.english: Crop selectivity results from rapid metabolic inactivation of the herbicide in the toler…
sentences.chinese: 作物的选择性由耐性作物的快速钝化代谢而引起。

sentences.english: Your patience indicates that you are a very single-minded man.
sentences.chinese: 你的耐性表明你是一个很专一的人。

sentences.english: The lurker is good for players with patience.
sentences.chinese: 潜行者很适用于有耐性的玩家。

sentences.english: Former Vice Foreign Minister Hitoshi Tanaka is among those who have lost patience with him.
sentences.chinese: 前副外相田中仁是对菅直人首相失去耐性的人之一。

sentences.english: Kim grows impatient and starts to head toward Rick in the water tower.
sentences.chinese: 金姆失去了耐性，开始向里克所在的水塔行进。

sentences.english: It was locked properly just as the man waited patiently as my embarrbummed spouse struggled to remember the comcompost bisexualnine .
sentences.chinese: 他耐性的等着我那穷困的丈夫设法回想起暗锁的密码。

sentences.english: Others are unable to sit still, stay quiet or be patient.
sentences.chinese: 有些是坐不住，不能保持安静或者没耐性。

sentences.english: The virus could attack the analysis by exhausting the patience of such an analyser.
sentences.chinese: 病毒就可能通过消磨此类分析器的耐性来攻击该分析。

sentences.english: The meek will usufriend wait patiently for the Lord.
sentences.chinese: 温文的人一定会耐性地等候主。

sentences.english: Should he be patient and save?
sentences.chinese: 他应该耐性等待，并开始存钱？

sentences.english: Still, Megatron is nothing. if not patient.
sentences.chinese: 威震天算不了什么的，如果他没有耐性。

sentences.english: In Bhopal, which bills itself as the City of Lakes, patience is already at breaking point.
sentences.chinese: 在博帕尔这个自称为城市之湖的地方，耐性已经崩溃。

sentences.english: For those who can't get out seem to have found a little more patience.
sentences.chinese: 那些出不去的人看起来已经变得更有耐性了。

sentences.english: Changes in desiccation tolerance of pea ( Pisum sativum) seeds during imbibition were studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究了豌豆种子吸胀过程中脱水耐性的变化模式。

sentences.english: We must have patience in doing arduous work.
sentences.chinese: 我们做艰苦的工作要有耐性。

definition: to endure/to bear with/to exercise patience/to restrain oneself/patience/endurance
to stay calm/to keep one's composure
